import Board from "./components/Board"; import Head from "./components/Head"; import Score from "./components/Score"; import SidePanel from "./components/SidePanel"; import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button"; import { Input } from "@/components/ui/input"; import { Sheet, SheetClose, SheetContent, SheetDescription, SheetFooter, SheetHeader, SheetTitle, SheetTrigger, } from "@/components/ui/sheet"; function App() { return (

); } export default App;
